page.title: 10Staplehurst Marching Band.
page.content: The band was formed in April 1983.It consisted of twelve boys and girls ranging in age from 5 to 15.The object of the band is to teach children to play instruments,for example drums, bell lyres and brass instruments without them having to learn to read music.This enables any child to play in the band within six weeks of join- ing. When they have learned to play their instrument (which the band supplies) they take part in marching routines and playing popular music such as"The Theme from the Magnificent Seven";"The Chariots of Fire";"Doh, Ray,Me"and "You'll Never Walk Alone". Today in June 1985 we have nineteen members who are taking part in fetes and carnivals all over the country.
